entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
